resources.string: Saya menyetujui Syarat dan Ketentuan dari PathXplorer

Privacy Policy


1. Introduction
 Thank you for using [Nama Aplikasi]. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our application.


2. Information Collection and Use
 We may collect the following types of information:
 - Personal Information: [e.g., Name, Email Address] when you voluntarily provide it to us.
 - Usage Data: Information about how you use the app, such as interactions and navigation patterns.


3. How We Use Your Information
 We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
 - To provide and maintain our application
 - To improve user experience
 - To communicate with you about updates, promotions, or support


4. Sharing and Disclosure
 We do not share or disclose your personal information with third parties, except as necessary to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights.


5. Security
 We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect it. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.


6. Links to Other Sites
 Our app may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites, as we are not responsible for their practices.


7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
 We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.


8. Contact Us
 If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at [email/contact info].


By using our app, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
